section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the install.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: The &THIS.APPLICATION; doesn't change the &THIS.PLATFORM; Hardware Requirements.

step.title: Downloading the source code

important.para: Subversion is used to manage its source code. Instructions for using Subversion, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use SVN to checkout a specific release source, the base URL is &THIS.RELEASE_SOURCE_CODE_URL;, then add the specific release version, lets consider &THIS.VERSION;.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.0.9 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the binaries.

Once the process finishes you should have the binary jar file in the target directory. Also &THIS.APPLICATION.BINARY.DIRNAME; directory should be present in target directory. It contains the required libraries and scripts that are used to invoke &THIS.APPLICATION;.

section.title: Development Trunk Source Building
section.para: This is a similar process to the one described in . The only change is the SVN source code URL, which is &THIS.TRUNK_SOURCE_CODE_URL;.
